discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Thanks for the PR! Additionally could you try to spot a few places in the current code of mathcomp where it would be beneficial to use these multirules and try them out?

discussion.author: ybertot
discussion.comment: Following up on an oral conversation, we should also add more instances of `linearE` in files where more rules can be added.

discussion.author: siraben
discussion.comment: Looks good! I think this would be useful in helping shape the goal into some normal form when dealing with linear functions.

review_discussion.comment: @ybertot can you push this change? Using the multirule here and there would be also nice, but not necessary for merging this PR strictly speaking. And we would like to merge this PR before the next release, since it is not a breaking change and looks very useful.
